['Of all the things the Greeks have given us, democracy and yoghurt take the top spots. While the former is of no use when you’re hungry, a cup of Epigamia Greek yoghurt is just perfect. Epigamia was the term used for marriage between two city-states in ancient Greece. We have adopted this word to talk about our celebration of the marriage of health and taste in our products; healthy preservative-free snacks that help you find your happy balance! Our journey started with us wanting to contemporise tradition by creating innovative items that have classic ingredients with modern twists thrown in. We wanted to push boundaries to create something new but familiar. Our Greek Yogurt is\xa0an example of this. It has all the healthy goodness of homemade dahi, with the added punch of high protein and zero preservatives. Taking forward this love we have for innovation, we daresay we’ve done it again! Introducing the first No Added Sugar Greek Yogurt in India. Made with real ingredients and no preservatives, our new mixed berry flavour brings you authentic farm-to-fridge taste. Made with the freshest of blueberries, raspberries and strawberries, this thick velvety yoghurt is a lip-smacking delight. Zero preservatives, high protein, real fruit content and no added sugar make this a great snack to beat the everyday hunger pangs. Give it a try and tell us what you think!']
